text: If there ’ s any celebrity out there that we can depend on to always keep it real, it ’ s Kristen Bell. From her kids ’ anal worms to her and her husband Dax Shepard ’ s relationship, Kristen isn ’ t afraid to tell it like it is. In an interview with Extra TV, Kristen was told that her “ Good Place ” co - star Ted Danson called her and Dax a power couple, and her response was classic Kristen Bell. “ In what regard? ” she responded to the statement. “ I guess — I don ’ t know what we have power over. It ’ s certainly not each other. Or our children. ” Oh, Kristen. She went on to say that they do what they can to get through each day, just like every other parent out there. “ We ’ re really
